name: ClarenceTheClepto
description:
!! PLAY ON FULLSCREEN !!

Clarence is a thief, who runs the streets in London at night time.

Play this 2D platformer and try to avoid animals and cops so you don't get caught.

Collect as many coins as possible, so Clarence can have the life he dreams of.

This was my first game project ever.

Code:

Laura Heikkinen

Ville Miettinen

Graphics:

Aleksi Saarinen

Carl Lindström

Elina Heino

Music & Sounds:
